Player History
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/2/2013, off Tim Lincecum (SF)...
Was selected to the 2013 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2013, hitting .563 with 1 HR, 3 RBI...
Traded from Houston to Los Angeles (A) on 2/2/2016 (Going to HOU: CF Mike Trout. Going to LAA: 2B Joe Wendle, 1B Lewin Diaz, 2B Jose Altuve)...
Won Gold Glove at Second Base in 2017...
0/0/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,375,000 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/13/2019 to a 6-year deal worth $15,500,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/2020, hitting .400 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against San Diego on 8/19/2021...
Drove in 6 runs against Washington on 4/19/2023...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Los Angeles (N) on 5/10/2023...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/2023, hitting .464 with 3 HR, 14 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2023, hitting .377 with 6 HR, 34 RBI...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
8/1/2024: Signed a contract extension with Atlanta, $15,500,000 per year, for 4 years.
Had 2000th career hit on 9/28/2024, off Ivan Lopez (NYM)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2025, hitting .591 with 4 HR, 6 RBI...
Had 6 hits with 2 RBI against Philadelphia on 7/4/2025...
